title: Sustainable Agriculture at Fickle Creek Farm

tasks.task: Introduce Fickle Creek Farm and its practices
subtasks: Describe the farm's location and size
Explain the commitment to sustainability and alternatives to certification
Mention local sourcing of feed and direct retail sales
Highlight customer support and community sustainability
Define agroforestry and its components
List benefits of trees (shade, aesthetics, erosion control)
Describe firewood production as a product
Discuss biodiversity improvements in the agroforestry system
Explain chicken introduction for fertilizer and pest control
Describe pig use for weed and rock eradication
Outline sheep, chicken, and duck management for post-harvest clearing

tasks.task: Address farm's role in watershed conservation
subtasks: Mention the farm's position in the Cane Creek Watershed
Note the conservation easement and restrictions on development

tasks.task: Recognize the challenges and impacts of sustainable farming
subtasks: Acknowledge farming's difficulty and local significance
